news.content:
Good day, all! ☀️

For those who missed the Ask Me Anything on Tuesday evening, you can find the call recording here.

Included in the description of the video are:

1. the timestamps, for easy call navigation & 2. the presentation that was used during the call.

With any further questions, please head to our forum. Thanks!
news.excerpt: For those who missed the Ask Me Anything on Tuesday evening, you can find the call recording within!
